images.text_verbatim:
CONFIRM VENT DIMENSIONS PRIOR TO MANUFACTURING
824
659 TO FIT INSIDE VENT
L5x3.5x1/4
3/8x1 1/4" Lg SS BOLT ASSY 2 PER SIDE (SUPPLIED W/ VENT)
30
5 TYP
NEW ROOF VENT
VENT MOUNT CURB TO BE WELDED TO EXISTING ROOF PLATE
EXISTING ROOF PLATE MIN 1/4" REQUIRED FOR WELDING
1 REQ'D – VENT MOUNT CURB
images.summary: This detail drawing shows the installation of a vent mount curb on a roof. The plan view indicates a square opening with dimensions of 824 mm, with a note to confirm vent dimensions prior to manufacturing. The curb is constructed from L5x3.5x1/4 angle sections. The section view details the connection of the vent mount curb to the existing roof plate, which requires a minimum of 1/4 inch for welding. The curb is secured with 3/8x1 1/4 inch long stainless steel bolt assemblies, with two bolts per side supplied with the vent. The drawing specifies that the vent mount curb must be welded to the existing roof plate, and a new roof vent will be installed. The typical spacing for certain components is noted as 5 mm. The drawing emphasizes the importance of confirming vent dimensions before manufacturing to ensure proper fit and installation.
